about_the_game:
"Pathfinder RPG - Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Jungle Multi-Pack


What forgotten mysteries and deadly perils await in the depths of the jungle? No Game Master wants to put the action on pause to draw every overgrown ruin or tangle of tropical trees. Fortunately, you don't have to! Pathfinder Flip-Mats provide ready-to-use and captivatingly detailed fantasy set pieces for the busy Game Master. Whether the heroes seek to explore an overgrown ruin, navigate a twisting pathway, discover a hidden waterfall, or seek shelter in a local village, these jungle scenes have you covered with four different combat maps in all! Don't waste your time sketching when you could be playing. With Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Jungle Multi-Pack, you'll be ready next time your players head into the jungle!

NOTE:  This product has been made specifically for the Pathfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Starfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
